FOR THIS CONTROL IS AUTOMATED. Do not Sign Off control manually
Please read https://confluence.intranet.db.com/x/ysZoG for further information.
Application Runbooks / Operating Instructions must be created / updated in ServiceNow for new applications. This is also preferred for existing. 
1. Ensure you have KCS1 role to draft and KCS3 to publish runbook Article
a. See attachment 'Revised Knowledge Training Deck V3.pptx' at bottom of the knowledge article (KB150937) with steps for KCS1 role.
https://dbunity.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB150937
2. For steps on creating a runbook Knowledge Article for a runbook refer to Link: https://dbunity.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=redirect.do?kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0312452 
3. For further guidance around the Knowledge Management process in Service Now refer to: https://dbunity.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB151647

FOR THIS CONTROL IS AUTOMATED. Do not Sign Off control manually
Please read https://confluence.intranet.db.com/x/ysZoG for further information.
Application Runbooks / Operating Instructions must be created / updated in ServiceNow for new applications. This is also preferred for existing. 
1. Ensure you have KCS1 role to draft and KCS3 to publish runbook Article
a. See attachment 'Revised Knowledge Training Deck V3.pptx' at bottom of the knowledge article (KB150937) with steps for KCS1 role.
https://dbunity.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB150937
2. For steps on creating a runbook Knowledge Article for a runbook refer to Link: https://dbunity.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=redirect.do?kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB0312452 
3. For further guidance around the Knowledge Management process in Service Now refer to: https://dbunity.service-now.com/kb_view.do?sysparm_article=KB151647
